author: Melanie Fine
comment: Ok at first glance, but overall not useful. Customers are sorted by first name!! And you cannot change the sort order. Too slow. Ok when you need a quick glance but no substitute for the main interface.

author: JJ Brown
comment: I am so sick of logging in over and over and over. Please fix this horrible glitch. Been waiting two years now. This app is useless.

author: Josh Flood
comment: I could not get past the login screen for over an hour

author: Dean Thomas
comment: Amazing and easy to use. I easily set up and customized my website and shopping cart with the app. And the design looks beautiful.

author: jose trejo
comment: I set up a local store who's inventory changes almost daily I'll really like that I can make changes to products on my phone but I can't add photos if I add a new product please fix that

author: Virgil Cunningham
comment: No

author: Daniel Petraglia
comment: Needs 2 things. 1 the ability to add photo on products from app. 2 ability to add phone orders or change orders from app. Then it would be perfect 5 stars please update.Needs photo ability.

author: Brian Harvey
comment: Doesn't work at all. Galaxy S7 nothing to report. Useless

author: Anthony Parsons
comment: Not accessible to view documents on Google Pixel🤔

author: Patrick O'Connor
comment: The reporting isn't very useful at all and while you can adjust inventory or process orders with the app it still lacks a lot of basic functionality. For example no access to coupon codes. App crashes a lot and sometimes won't login at all. It's on par with the rest of the platform I suppose.
title: Not very functional

author: Kylie Salsman
comment: Most days this app works but every now and then, at least once a week, it crashes and I have to log in again. I can deal with that. What would be really, extremely useful would be an audible alert/notification as to a sale. I'm sure other users who use alternative websites in addition to their main website get the same joy I do hearing an alert/tone when a sale is made. A simple request, no?      Update: 9/28/16- app will not accept my username and password anymore. All info is correct and I can't login.
title: Buggy mostly and needs an audio alert

author: John Kosloskey
comment: Clean, easy to use. Great way to get overall idea of store performance. Only thing that i would like to see is thath it could do better with notification options.... i.e. every order, certain items are ordered, revenue benchmarks are hit, etc
title: Serves its purpose

author: Lindsay
comment: This app no longer let's me log on, saying the user name and password do not match the records. I was using it for a couple of weeks with no problems, then this happened (started last Friday) I am able to get on their normal site, with no problems. I have since uninstalled the app. Will reinstall when problems are fixed.
title: Will not let me log on

author: Dan Ziem
comment: I have tried multiple times to "capture" payment on sales through the application and it has never worked. It showed one sale as captured so I sent the product out only to find out later that it glitched our system and they had not paid for the item yet. Only useful thing this application does is allow me to manually check if I have orders randomly.  Needs a push notifications of some sort as well.
title: Minimal benefits

author: Landon Wood
comment: This app is so slow to load its data and present information.  When it finally present sales figures the data is inaccurate for two reasons. 1) The sales totals on the app don't always match the totals on the store back end.  2) (Most frustrating for me) The daily reporting is a 24 report.   There is no way to report your sales tally for the day. You are restricted to only reporting the past 24 hours which is totally unhelpful for anyone attempting to understand the sales pace of the current day.
title: Slow, inaccurate, unhelpful reporting

author: Jennifer Briscuso
comment: I've sent multiple emails, regarding a major issue with reporting. My issue is clearly stated, many users with same issue. I don't have time to call. I don't understand why reporting is shown as a rolling 24 hours. Retail businesses need to see reporting from 12:00am to 11:59pm. NOT a rolling 24 hours. I want to see day over day results. Rolling 24h reporting makes no sense, it's useless to my business. It's really unfortunate that Volusion will not take comments by many users and make some changes.

reply.author: Volusion, Inc
reply.content: We're sorry to hear you are facing issues with our Android app. The support team has not received any emails from you regarding this topic. Our attempts to reach out to you via the listed contact information have also been unsuccessful. Please contact our support team at 1.800.646.3517 at your earliest convenience.Thank you!

title: Rolling 24 h Reporting is USELESS!

author: Justin Wommer
comment: I emailed the android support team about a login issue and haven't received a reply in over 2 weeks.....still no response. 1/2/16. Still can't log into the app.
title: Poor Response

author: Mike Farrington
comment: Great for orders and product management.  It could use some enhancements, but overall a good tool to connect real-time to your Volusion store. I can see the mobile app becoming the preferred site management tool among Volusion store admins.  -mike
title: Good App

author: Daniel Hamilton
comment: It's so much easier to view simple Web sales data on android than it is on the dashboard. It would be good for the Web Development team to take a look at what the Android staff has done here.
title: Great app, even better than their Web dashboad

author: L Y
comment: Most of the time my orders won't load and dashboard is empty with a error message "your administrator account does not have permission" :/
title: Only works half the time

author: John Hancock
comment: Used to apply changes easily but now can't login to my account using the application.
title: Fails to stay relevant

author: Hiram Oliver
comment: For some reason it has stopped loading my data. Uninstalled it! Fix it. Then I'll re download it. Thanks!
title: problems.

author: Bran Marion
comment: Always after i loggin after few days it doesnt show anything.its all blank
title: Many errors

author: Courtney Ellis
comment: I've been using this app for months now and recently it won't accept my password and email combination. All my credentials work fine when I sign on through the computer.
title: Buggy

author: Aaron Philipose
comment: Bug fixed seems yo be fixed for me but I would like to see notification options such as turning off the notifications of low inventory
title: Good but can definitely improve

author: jason s
comment: Still getting use to this app but it is much easier than signing on the laptop. Ty volution
title: Not bad at all

author: Shawnna Pitts
comment: I feel a (Neighbor) who asked for sugar and was invited in to the party. Very helpful staff. Thank you.
title: Love It!

author: John Caraway
comment: Decent app for keeping up from home, but buggy and crashes intermittently

author: Miguel Gonzalez
comment: Awesome app wish it would have a section that you can do and send your email newsletters that would be awesome!!
title: Great app!

author: Eric Conley
comment: Great way to do online business. Volusion makes it easy to get started.
title: Owner

author: misty waskovich
comment: Always everything with volusion I love.  Been a customer since 2007!

author: Robert Jaime
comment: App is always crashing

author: C. Y. L.
comment: I only use this app to check on orders. So far so good.

author: R McKnight
comment: Great app.
title: Owner of Smart Electronics Now

author: Richard Chu
comment: Very efficient app for daily snapshots.

author: Aka Time2Die
comment: Awesome app

author: Carl Mulder
comment: Nice app. But needs some things added in my opinion. Auto update would be nice so if an order comes in I instantly know when. I'd like to see more information on the sales page like customer email and more, so I can email a customer when out of the office. Hope to see these changes come.
title: Great app, needs fine tuning

author: Gerald Roach
comment: As soon as I login it says session has expired and kicks me out...
title: Session has expired

author: JoeRebekka Hudson
comment: Would be nice to upload pictures. What's the point of adding an item if you can't add a picture.

reply.author: Volusion, Inc
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate it and are working hard to introduce said functionality in a future release. Stay tuned!

author: timothy riley
comment: It would be better if you could load merchandise pics.

reply.author: Volusion, Inc
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate it and are working hard to introduce said functionality in a future release. Stay tuned!

title: Volusion app
